Container.Name: Krusader
Container.Description:
Krusader is a fully featured file manager, highly configurable. [br][br]
This container was forked from sparklyballs/krusader[br] Similarly to MakeMKV this container mounts /dev/sr0 (eg. your BluRay drive) at /media/bluray[br][br]
[b][span style="color: red"]BE VERY CAREFUL AS YOU CAN DELETE THINGS YOU MAY NOT INTEND TO[br] I AM NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR YOUR BAD DECISIONS.[/span][br] Map /UNRAID to a local folder tree you wish to perform actions on. Add other mappings manually if you wish.
Container.Overview: Added automatic drive mounting at /mnt/bluray. Krusader is a highly configurable, fully featured file manager. Full gui in a RDP container accessible via browser.
